main event: A reported UFO sighting took place in Dayton, Ohio, on November 6, 1964, between 0530 and 0315Z.
interesting points: The object was described as similar to a star or planet., The duration of the observation was 1.5 minutes., The sky conditions were bright at the time of the sighting., The course of the object was noted as erratic., The object was concluded to be astronomical based on the report.
sighted object: an object similar to a star or planet
